bug.author: cereallarceny
bug.summary: Part 07 example has abnormally high loss
bug.description:
Describe the bug In the /example folder, Part 07 has a very high loss amount, even after 10 epochs. To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Run Jupyter Notebook Go to the 7th example and run the notebook all the way through. The last code blog where you train the model creates an abnormally high loss rate... in the thousands.
Expected behavior I'd expect the loss to be much lower.
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1297930/66203611-afcb4180-e6a0-11e9-8830-2f7d178fdc75.png></denchmark-link>
Desktop (please complete the following information):
OS: MacOS 10.14.6
